name: Legend Women wrestling
description:
Legend Women wrestling is a 3d game with realistic environment you will feel your self in boxing ring. Ring boxing game is interesting and challenging for you all you need is to attack your opponent with full force.ultimate superstar wrestling mania will give you hell of fun and entertainment. take the risk beat all your opponent and win the game and become a female challenger boxer.you will get support from audience they will appreciate your shots. to win the series of world women legend wrestling fight you have to go hard be patient,be strong,be brave to survive in this battle.this game is more worse then ever war battle games your spirit must be high
Features :
- 3D Realistic environment.
- Modern boxing ring fight.
- Multi opponent girls fight.
- Women ring war.
- Girl wrestling mania fight.
- Real female fight 3D.
- Smooth Controls.
- Amazing Graphics.
